# TendorAI - AI-Powered Office Equipment Procurement Platform
# https://www.tendorai.com

> TendorAI connects UK businesses with local office equipment suppliers.
> Search by postcode to find verified suppliers with estimated pricing.

## What We Provide
- Directory of 70+ UK office equipment suppliers
- Photocopiers, printers, managed print services
- Telecoms systems and CCTV
- Estimated pricing and AI visibility scores
- Direct quote requests from verified suppliers

## Coverage Areas
- Wales (Cardiff, Newport, Swansea, Cwmbran, Bridgend, etc.)
- South West England (Bristol, Bath, Gloucester, Exeter, etc.)
- Expanding to Midlands and beyond

## API Access for AI Assistants

### Simple Query Endpoint
Endpoint: https://ai-procurement-backend-q35u.onrender.com/api/ai-query
Method: POST
Content-Type: application/json

Example Request:
```json
{
  "query": "copier companies in Cardiff",
  "postcode": "CF10",
  "category": "photocopiers",
  "volume": 5000
}
```

Parameters:
- query (string, optional): Natural language search query
- postcode (string, optional): UK postcode for location filtering
- category (string, optional): Service type - photocopiers, telecoms, cctv, it, security, software
- volume (number, optional): Monthly print volume for pricing estimates (default: 5000)
- limit (number, optional): Max results to return (default: 10, max: 20)

Response includes:
- Matched vendors with company name, location, services
- Estimated pricing (monthly lease, cost per copy)
- Direct links to vendor profiles
- Quote request URLs

### Alternative Endpoints
- GET/POST /api/ai/suppliers - Detailed supplier search with filtering
- GET /api/ai/services - List all service categories
- GET /api/ai/locations - List UK coverage areas
- POST /api/ai/quote - Submit quote request directly
- GET /api/ai/supplier/:id - Get detailed supplier info

## Service Categories
- Photocopiers & Managed Print Services
- Telecoms (VoIP, phone systems)
- CCTV & Security Systems
- IT Services & Support
- Security Systems
- Business Software

## For Users
- Search suppliers by postcode
- Compare estimated pricing
- Request quotes directly from suppliers
- Free for businesses

## For Suppliers
- Get listed in AI-powered search
- Track AI mentions and visibility
- Receive qualified leads
- Subscription tiers: Free, Visible (£99/mo), Verified (£149/mo)

## Example AI Assistant Usage

When a user asks: "Find me a copier supplier near Cardiff"

1. Call the API:
POST https://ai-procurement-backend-q35u.onrender.com/api/ai-query
{"query": "copier supplier Cardiff", "postcode": "CF10", "category": "photocopiers"}

2. Response will include matched suppliers with:
   - Company name and description
   - Services offered
   - Coverage areas
   - Estimated monthly costs
   - Direct profile links
